panels.title: Daily Peak of Request per Second

targets.expr: sum(rate(nginx_request_status_count[5m]))

panels.title: Daily Peaks of Request per Second

targets.expr: (sum(increase(nginx_request_status_count{status_code!~"2..|3..|5.."}[5m])) by (status_code) / ignoring(status_code) group_left sum(increase(nginx_request_status_count[5m]))) * 100
(sum(increase(nginx_request_status_count{status_code!~"2..|3..|4.."}[5m])) by (status_code) / ignoring(status_code) group_left sum(increase(nginx_request_status_count[5m]))) * 100
(sum(increase(kong_request_status_count{status_code!~"2..|3..|5.."}[5m])) by (api, status_code) / ignoring(api, status_code) group_left sum(increase(kong_request_status_count[5m])))
(sum(increase(kong_request_status_count{status_code!~"2..|3..|4.."}[5m])) by (api, status_code) / ignoring(api, status_code) group_left sum(increase(kong_request_status_count[5m])))
(host) * on (instance) group_left(nodename) node_load1
(node_load1) * on (instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info{job="vm-node-exporter"}
sum(irate(container_cpu_user_seconds_total{image!="", container_label_com_docker_swarm_service_name=~"$service"}[5m])) by (name)
increase(kong_request_count[5m])
kong_latency_time
